Donald Trump Tells Pro-Israel Crowd He Canâ€™t Be Bought, Gets Booed
posts.extended: Speaking to the Republican Jewish Coalition on Thursday, Donald Trump once again demonstrated how he is not your typical presidential candidate. He went on to mock rival Jeb Bush for taking money from interest groups and then toeing their line.

posts.description: Fuck You, Spike Lee - Film - The Stranger
posts.extended: Movie reviewers are pretty solitary people. We silently file into dark theaters with our notepads and watch a screening, we nod at the studio rep on our way out, perhaps giving a vague quote like "Interesting" or "Nice soundtrack" when asked for a first impression.

posts.description: The Street Dreams Of Steve Sweatpants | Bevel
posts.extended: New York City thrives on its hustle, a mentality Steve Sweatpants knows all too well. The Brooklyn (by way of Queens) creative has made his mark in New York and beyond by simply following his gut instinct to move in the direction of his dreams.
